sent.orig: Respect the wilderness, respect the life. Save the nature for your unborn child.
sent.trans: 尊重野生环境，尊重野生生命！为了我们的下一代，请保护自然！

sent.orig: If one does not have respect for oneself, one can't expect others to respect him.
sent.trans: 如果一个人不能自重，那么就别指望别人尊敬他。

sent.orig: And by showing respect for your competitors, you will demonstrate America's respect for the world.
sent.trans: 通过对你们的竞争对手表示尊重，你们将证明美国对世界的尊重。

sent.orig: Eliza, however, insists that Higgins respect her and the story ends with her winning his respect.
sent.trans: 但是，伊莱扎坚持认为希金斯应该尊重她，在故事的结尾她也赢得了他的尊重。

sent.orig: Follow the three R's: Respect for self; Respect for others;Responsibility for all your actions.
sent.trans: 遵守三项原则：尊重自我，尊重他人，对自己的行为负责。
